item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-01-10
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Orlando becomes one of first cities in country to switch to Google e-mail...http://bit.ly/7PIcwL #
  • I'm at Whole Foods Market (Dedham) (950 Providence Highway, 300 Legacy Place, Dedham). #
  • I'm at Burdick Chocolate (52 Brattle St, Cambridge). #
